experience.title: Experience
experience.description: In this section, you will find my work experience and featured projects, reflecting my technical skills and ability to bring value to teams.

items.title: Tournament Manager
items.description: Led the development of an application within a team of 4 people, using Scrum as the work framework and opting for the MVC design model for our manager.

items.title: Administrative Claims Management System
items.description: Together with a colleague, we developed a system for a consortium that allows generating claims and storing related information.
